sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './index.sass' const API_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL export default function ({ ad: { id, title, description, price, name, idPublic}, user:{id: idUser}, adDetail, onCreateChat}) { let me = false if (idPublic === idUser) {me = true} return me ? (
{price}€

{title}

{description}

{name}

) : (
{price}€

{title}

{description}

{ event.preventDefault() }}>{name}
) }
